General.Name: Vertex Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Vertex Minerals Limited engages in evaluation and exploration of minerals in New South Wales and Western Australia. The company primarily explores for gold and nickel. It holds interests in the Hill End project comprising 5 exploration licenses, a gold lease, and 10 mining leases located in the eastern Lachlan Fold Belt in New South Wales; the Hargraves project with a granted exploration tenement located in New South Wales; the Taylors Rock project with a granted exploration tenement located in Western Australia; and the Pride of Elvire Gold project with one granted tenement located in Western Australia. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Peppermint Grove, Australia.
